name: Shory Aerialist
prereq: Garundi Ethnicity, Mauxi Ethnicity, Or Tian-yae Ethnicity; Shory Aeromancer Or Ability To Cast Fly
summary: Unique in Golarion’s history, the Shory people developed fighting styles dedicated to combat in the air.
description:
Unique in Golarion’s history, the Shory people developed fighting styles dedicated to combat in the air. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Acrobatics checks to Maneuver in Flight and a +5-foot status bonus to your fly Speed whenever you are flying via magic.Traits

Human: A creature with this trait is a member of the human ancestry. Humans are a diverse array of people known for their adaptability. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by humans.
